column5: Anyone been through "The Rags" recently? Just wondering if it is smooth sailing or not. Thanks.
i don't think this will help much but since no one else has replied- i went through on june 22 and had no problems. shallowest spot was about 3' then scar
Thanks for the info Scar. Leaving in a week. Gettin' a little antsy. Skinny

If you're referring to the Rags on Lac Seul, it is still safe to travel through. The water levels are still very good even though the lakes that flow in from the English River (Minitaki, Abram, and Pelican) are all very low.

If you're referring to the Rags on Lac Seul, it is still safe to travel through. The water levels are still very good even though the lakes that flow in from the English River (Minitaki, Abram, and Pelican) are all very low.

You need not be concerned with water levels on Lac Seul. If there is a shortage of water from the English River because of low levels there, the power company goes out and opens the flood gates on Lake St. Joseph allowing the water to flow south into Lac Seul via the Root River rather than flow north toward Hudson Bay. Last week the water level was right up there.
